# Welcome to Grafana Cloud Testing & Synthetics 

Welcome to Grafana Cloud Testing & Synthetics app! This interactive guide will walk you through: 

- How To Navigate Through Testing & Synthetic app main sections
- Understanding the key areas: K6 Performance Testing, Synthetic Monitoring Checks

## **Tour of Testing & Synthetics**

Let's start by exploring the main areas of Testing & Synthetics. We'll visit each key section so you know where everything is located.
First, let's navigate to the Testing & Synthetics section from the Home page.

Select Performance
---
This is where you'll find Grafana Cloud k6 performance testing, powered by k6 OSS. Write and execute performance tests from 21 geographic locations worldwide to catch failures before they impact your customers.

View the Onboarding Section
----
This is where you'll find step-by-step guides to help you get started with k6 performance testing alongside with documentation.

Open the Projects Section
----
This is where all of your K6 projects will live, you can click into existing projects to see test results.

Open the Settings section
----
This is where all of your Settings for K6 live from your environment details, usage, schedule test and tokens.

Open the Learn section
----
This is where all of you can learn about K6 through the documentation and instructions

Move To The Synthetic Section
---
Grafana Cloud Synthetic Monitoring proactively monitors the performance of your critical user flows, websites, and APIs from locations around the world.

Select Checks
---
This is where all of your checks will live, you'll be able to see analytics for each checks like uptime, reachability and latency.

Select Probes
---
Probes are monitoring agents that simulate user interactions by sending requests to URLs and measure performance from different geographical locations. You have the options to deploy public or private probes behind firewalls.

Select Alerts
---
View and edit default alerts for Synthetic Monitoring here. To tie one of these alerts to a check, you must select the alert sensitivity from the Alerting section of the check form when creating a check.

Select Config
---
Configure your Synthetic Monitoring settings, access tokens, terraform, secrets

## **Congratulations!**

Amazing work! You've completed your welcome tour of Testing & Synthetic Section. You now know:

- Navigate Through Testing & Synthetic app main sections
- Understanding the key areas: K6 Performance Testing, Synthetic Monitoring Checks

**You're now ready to explore Testing & Synthetics!** Try visiting each section to get familiar with the different features available.
